channel.title: CVE Feed for enchant97 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for enchant97 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-41819|2024-08-05T10:22:35.371Z -- enchant97 -- note-mark
item.description: Note Mark is a web-based Markdown notes app. A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Note Mark allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts via a crafted payload injected into the URL value of a link in the markdown content. This vulnerability is fixed in 0.13.1.
